short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collection of small & convenient CSV tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes you need to finish some simple tasks on CSV processing like CSV to XML/JSON/YAML, or you need to manipulate CSV data like transposing or encoding them. This extension can help you get them done easily. 

Just paste what you want to process, and click on start button, then wait for the result to come out. It is fast and effective! 

15 functions are available for now and more will be added to the extension in a regular basis. 

- CSV to JSON: converts CSV data to JSON format
- JSON to CSV: converts JSON data to CSV format
- CSV to XML: converts CSV data to XML format
- XML to CSV: converts XML data to CSV format
- CSV to YAML: converts CSV data to YAML format
- YAML to CSV: converts YAML data to CSV format
- CSV to TSV: converts CSV data to TSV format
- TSV to CSV: converts TSV data to CSV format
- Base64 Encode: converts CSV data to Base64-encode format
- Base64 Decode: converts Base64-encoded data to original CSV
- URL Encode: converts CSV data to URL-encode format
- URL Decode: converts URL-encoded data to original CSV
- Cols to Rows: converts columns of CSV data to rows
- Rows to Cols: converts rows of CSV data to columns
- Transpose CSV: transpose CSV by making columns into rows

Enjoy the ease of use offered by our CSV tools! Additionally, we've provided links to other tool extensions we've developed, including JSON, XML and ChatGPT, for your convenience.
